title: Council Edition: Councilmember Lewis discusses Partnership for Zero, public safety & more
description:
How is the Seattle City Council reacting to the recent State of the City address from Mayor Harrell, and his request to hire more police officers? Plus, what impact will a new $10M program have on the number of people living unsheltered downtown? Councilmember Andrew J. Lewis (District 7 - Pioneer Square to Magnolia) answers these questions and the ones you're sending in, too, on Council Edition.

View the City of Seattle's commenting policy: seattle.gov/online-comment-policy
